author: Giovanni Collazo
name: brunch-with-ember-reloaded
description: A new and up-to-date Brunch skeleton for developing Ember applications

scripts.emberupdate: curl http://builds.handlebarsjs.com.s3.amazonaws.com/handlebars-latest.js > vendor/scripts/handlebars.js && curl http://builds.emberjs.com/release/ember.js > vendor/scripts/ember.js && curl http://builds.emberjs.com.s3.amazonaws.com/ember-data-latest.js > vendor/scripts/ember-data.js
